name: Spacets
description:
A cat and a dog get in conflict after their spatial station is invaded by aliens.

You can play this game in two modes:

- Arcade: The players must use the environment and its resources in order to clean their way to the only escaping ship, while blocking the adversary's way, simultaneously.

- Arena:  The players fight each other directly, while avoid getting blown out of the station and getting killed by the aliens.
